Plot: A man tries to live a normal life despite the fact that he sometimes turns into a sheepdog.
Title: The Shaggy Dog
Writer: Cormac Wibberley (screenplay), Marianne Wibberley (screenplay), Geoff Rodkey (screenplay), Jack Amiel (screenplay), Michael Begler (screenplay), Bill Walsh (earlier screenplay "The Shaggy Dog"), Lillie Hayward (earlier screenplay "The Shaggy Dog"), Don Tait (earlier screenplay "The Shaggy D.A.")
Actors: Tim Allen, Kristin Davis, Zena Grey, Spencer Breslin
